verses.verse: Now these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, which were born <S%H3205><s%> unto him in Hebron <S%H2275><s%>; the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> Amnon <S%H550><s%>, of Ahinoam <S%H293><s%> the Jezreelitess <S%H3159><s%>; the second <S%H8145><s%> Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, of Abigail <S%H26><s%> the Carmelitess <S%H3762><s%>: Daniel: or, Chileab 2Sam.3.3.

The third <S%H7992><s%>, Absalom <S%H53><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maachah <S%H4601><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Talmai <S%H8526><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Geshur <S%H1650><s%>: the fourth <S%H7243><s%>, Adonijah <S%H138><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Haggith <S%H2294><s%>:
The fifth <S%H2549><s%>, Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%> of Abital <S%H37><s%>: the sixth <S%H8345><s%>, Ithream <S%H3507><s%> by Eglah <S%H5698><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>.

These six <S%H8337><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> unto him in Hebron <S%H2275><s%>; and there he reigned <S%H4427><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> months <S%H2320><s%>: and in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> he reigned <S%H4427><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And these were born <S%H3205><s%> unto him in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; Shimea <S%H8092><s%>, and Shobab <S%H7727><s%>, and Nathan <S%H5416><s%>, and Solomon <S%H8010><s%>, four <S%H702><s%>, of Bathshua <S%H1340><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Ammiel <S%H5988><s%>: Shimea: or, Shammua 2. Sam.5.14. Bathshua: or, Bathsheba 2Sam.11.13. Ammiel: or, Eliam 2. Sam.11.3.
Ibhar <S%H2984><s%> also, and Elishama <S%H476><s%>, and Eliphelet <S%H467><s%>, Elishama: or, Elishua 2Sa.5.15.
And Nogah <S%H5052><s%>, and Nepheg <S%H5298><s%>, and Japhia <S%H3309><s%>,
And Elishama <S%H476><s%>, and Eliada <S%H450><s%>, and Eliphelet <S%H467><s%>, nine <S%H8672><s%>. Eliada: or, Beeliada IChro.14.7.
These were all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, beside the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the concubines <S%H6370><s%>, and Tamar <S%H8559><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>.

And Solomon's <S%H8010><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> was Rehoboam <S%H7346><s%>, Abia <S%H29><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Asa <S%H609><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Abia: or, Abijam I. king.15.1.
Joram <S%H3141><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Joash <S%H3101><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Ahaziah: or, Azariah 2. Chr.22.6.& 21.17.
Amaziah <S%H558><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Azariah <S%H5838><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Jotham <S%H3147><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Azariah: or, Uzziah 2. king.15.30.
Ahaz <S%H271><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,
Amon <S%H526><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Josiah <S%H2977><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> were, the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> Johanan <S%H3110><s%>, the second <S%H8145><s%> Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%>, the third <S%H7992><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%>, the fourth <S%H7243><s%> Shallum <S%H7967><s%>. Johanan: or, Jehochaz 2. kin.23.30. Jehoiakim: or, Eliakim 2. kin.23.34. Zedekiah: or, Mathaniah.2. kin.24.17.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%>: Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>. Jeconiah: also called, Jehoiachin 2kin.24.6, Zedekiah: or Coniah ier.22.24
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%>; Assir <S%H617><s%>, Salathiel <S%H7597><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Salathiel: Heb. Shealtiel
Malchiram <S%H4443><s%> also, and Pedaiah <S%H6305><s%>, and Shenazar <S%H8137><s%>, Jecamiah <S%H3359><s%>, Hoshama <S%H1953><s%>, and Nedabiah <S%H5072><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pedaiah <S%H6305><s%> were, Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%>, and Shimei <S%H8096><s%>: and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%>; Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, and Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, and Shelomith <S%H8019><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>:
And Hashubah <S%H2807><s%>, and Ohel <S%H169><s%>, and Berechiah <S%H1296><s%>, and Hasadiah <S%H2619><s%>, Jushabhesed <S%H3142><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>; Pelatiah <S%H6410><s%>, and Jesaiah <S%H3470><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rephaiah <S%H7509><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Arnan <S%H770><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Obadiah <S%H5662><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shechaniah <S%H7935><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shechaniah <S%H7935><s%>; Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>: and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>; Hattush <S%H2407><s%>, and Igeal <S%H3008><s%>, and Bariah <S%H1282><s%>, and Neariah <S%H5294><s%>, and Shaphat <S%H8202><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Neariah <S%H5294><s%>; Elioenai <S%H454><s%>, and Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%>, and Azrikam <S%H5840><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%>. Hezekiah: Heb. Hiskijah

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elioenai <S%H454><s%> were, Hodaiah <S%H1939><s%>, and Eliashib <S%H475><s%>, and Pelaiah <S%H6411><s%>, and Akkub <S%H6126><s%>, and Johanan <S%H3110><s%>, and Dalaiah <S%H1806><s%>, and Anani <S%H6054><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%>.
